title: If God is against atheists, why does he not kill them?  - Quora

response.answer_text: You just answered your own question…If there was a God - he would just kill anyone who is against him… step on them like insignificant ants… yet - he doesn’t. It’s people who kill in the name of God… mostly other religious people from another religion…which means people are “God”, as God wouldn’t need human’s help on that. But God never killed anyone himself. Just like Superman never did…as Superman doesn’t really exist, does he ?God was never seen by anyone… outside their own imagination.God has no single proof for existence.It is a made up story created to put fear in people and have them obey religion rules. Let me ask you this - if you wanted your own people to stop killing and stealing and raping - would you tell them “Anthony said you must stop because it’s not a good thing to do!” - OR - would you tell them “God almighty will punish you if you don’t stop !”…Same thing as if you wanted your own people to go to war for you and kill your enemy… would they risk their lives for you - OR - would they do it for a God that “wants” them to do it … ? Even if you create a human hero - a strong and fearless warrior that is going to scare people from doing bad things … he is just a human. He can get hurt… he can die… someone would eventually go against him and kill him… and there goes your “power” of controlling people. But a “God”… someone that no one sees and no one can hurt…that NEVER NEVER dies… that’s a much better story, don’t you think? - it’s a story that can last 2000 years :) God does not kill atheists … he does not kill anyone…simply because he does not exist. He NEVER did. It’s a myth… a scary story they used to tell before bed to make their kids behave… it’s like Baba Yaga… or Santa Clause. Why do you think they invented Santa ? - to make kids be good all year long so they can get gifts on Xmas day… it’s a motivational character.God is the EXACT same thing… but God will send you to HELL if you misbehave… more scary… more “adulty”. God will punish you if you steal or murder… will not let you go into heaven when you die…bla bla. If you think about ALL that you know about God - everything… including death and angels and hell and heaven… how do you know about that ? - all from stories… But how do the people who wrote those stories knew about it ? I assure you there is not a single person in the world that visited Hell and came back to tell how it’s like… God was “invented” in a way that he could not be proven. Or disprovenThat’s the only smart thing they did about God… everything else is complete stupidity. He has no specific powers - just everything he wants to do - he can do… He can fly and live in the sky but we cannot see him or go to him or catch him or hurt him… He can create the entire world… but only long time ago, not now… now he does nothing. He is always coming “tomorrow”.. not today… always tomorrow… Everything good is thanks to him, and everything bad is because he teaches us a lesson… no matter what happens to you - it’s God. Why ? Because God works in mysterious ways… TRANSLATION : he does everything - good and evil… you cannot understand him.  And he has super brain that can read ALL our minds and know everything about us and remember everything we did all our lives - and know our sins… all billions of us. He is THAT smart… yep… he is a super computer. If you really think about it - God is a superhero a kid would make up… it has no logic and by itself is very stupid. It’s very vague and makes absolutely no sense… unless you’re a 4 years old.They really were VERY stupid back then when he was invented.Today , he would be more like Superman … :)

As I write, the question is “If God is against atheists, why does he not kill them?” There are at least three big assumptions there, one that god exists, another that god has a problem with atheists, and a third that we have a narcissistic god who prioritises being worshiped above all else, so he or she would single out atheists rather than say pedophiles, racists, murderers and others who have done wrong in life. The obvious answer is that in the unlikely event that a god exists, he or she is clearly OK with atheists being around. Maybe that’s because the whole religious thing hasn’t worked so well at getting people to be better people - just look at the US where many of the most religious are lining up behind Trump. Maybe it is because god just isn’t too bothered about being worshiped and wants to see what people will do if they have free will and no religion telling them what to do. Nobody knows the answer to that, all we do know is that if a god existed and wanted to reveal themselves to atheists they could easily do so. Religions can be divided into those that believe in a good god who wants people to be nice to each other and create a better world, with rewards and punishment in this life or the next depending on how you treat others. Or a narcissistic, or even an evil god, who is not bothered by your behaviour and instead focuses on whether you worship them. The question only makes sense if there is a god, and he or she is this sort of god rather than a benevelont one.
